section.p: This section contains social history data that influence a patient's physical, psychological or emotional health (e.g., smoking status, pregnancy). Demographic data, such as marital status, race, ethnicity, and religious affiliation, is captured in the header.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7936, CONF:1198-10449, CONF:1198-32494 ) such that it
